title: Cosy location - 10 minutes from train station
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. Commuters and tourists come across the constant hustle and bustle of the station before exiting, taking a few steps and stopping amazed in Piazza di Santa Maria Novella. It is impossible not to admire the the square, housing one of the most charming basilicas in Florence. The area has plenty of local spots to taste Tuscan specialties, but don’t stop in the main streets alone; the narrower side streets always ensure satisfaction. The huge Parco Delle Cascine provides a solution to the need for a green area as well as a historic welcome in the form of a bronze statue of King Vittorio Emanuele II riding a horse.

title: A hotel with a view...
review: Took us 15 minutes to get from the firenze  SMN train station with our luggage, 10 minutes without luggage. This is very useful if you want to go take the bus to the outlet shop.   Very close to the Arno river and from there, you can get to the Uffizi and Ponte Vecchio. I believe Kraft is the third row of apartments from the river, making it relatively quiet at night.  Rooms were a bit dated but typical of Italy. Counter staff were helpful, while breakfast staff were friendly and warm.

title: florence
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you very much for your review and we take note of your suggestions which are very important to us.  Our best regards  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: Almost worth it for the view
review: Upon our arrival we were greeted by an exceedingly friendly and helpful staff.  The room and bath were both lovely, spotless and larger than expected.  Dinner on the rooftop is a must, the view of the city is fantastic and the food and drinks are top notch. A tasty breakfast (also served on the rooftop) is included and offers a wide variety of both hot and cold fare.  There is also a rooftop pool.  Added bonus, the hotel is within walking distance of the train station, shopping and sites to be seen.  When we return to Florence, we will without a doubt be staying at this hotel.

title: Amazing Hotel!
review: A nice location on a quite street.  Walk to train station in 10 minutes.  the river just a couple blocks.  Had a lovely room very spacious with a lovely terrace to sit and enjoy a cocktail.  The room was very nice and clean comfortable bedding and mattress . the a/c was quite.  the room was quite as well.  the bathroom was nice and spacious with tub and shower.  nice amenities as well.  the hotel staff was very friendly and helpful.  Upstairs the restaurant was very nice with lovely views and a nice heated pool.  Roberto and his staff were very friendly and helpful.  Roberto made you feel at home every morning taking time to chat.  we loved our leisurely breakfasts upstairs.  Coffee was very good and all the fresh baked goodies were exceptional.  We really enjoyed our stay and…

title: Wonderful hotel, wonderful employees and wonderful roof top restaurant
review: Dear valued guest,  We thank you for your feedback and we are happy you had a nice experience at the Kraft Hotel.  Our warmest regards  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: Kraft
review: My wife and I stayed at the Kraft Hotel for four night at the end of October. It is without doubt one of the best hotels I've stayed in. The rooftop terrace/bar is a real highlight and the views over Florence (including the iconic Duomo) are stunning. The main centre is only a short 10 minute walk away through quiet, well-lit streets by the river. Friendly, helpful staff and a lovely, relaxed atmosphere make this a great hotel for a visit to a brilliant city. Would absolutely come back if we were to visit Florence again.

title: Best hotel of our trip
review: Two night with our big puppy.  Unlike many hotels  where they tell you that dogs are welcome to find out they are too big or too hairy and only allowed in the room, this one is really dog friendly. Nice receiving, nice spacious room with lots of space for our puppy. Very welcome on the terrace restaurant. We will definitely be back :)

title: Simply perfect
review: Dear Nicolò,  Thank you very much for your feedback and we are happy you have found your hotel Florence by staying at the Kraft Hotel !  Looking forward to welcoming you again, we remain with our  best regards  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: Great location, lovely views
review: This was the best hotel of our trip through Tuscany (and we stayed in a total of 5 hotels). It was modern and clean, but still had some old-world charm. The rooftop is incredible, with a pool (which is small but still great to swim in) and an amazing view over the rooftops of Florence, including the Duomo. Breakfast was great. We used the valet service to park our car and it went super smoothly. Location is great, easily walking distance into the center of the city. Bathroom was super modern and clean. We would stay here again!

review: Great view over Florence from rooftop pool, Restaurant was delicious, we ate there both nights as it was easier than going out after spending time by the pool. Staff very friendly and helpful, All spoke English. Spacious room, with balcony to sit and enjoy the sunshine.

Everything was within a walking distance to main attractions. Thank you for our pleasant and memorable stay.

title: Great hotel
review: I am very fussy, I like a nice hotel with excellent rooms and top quality staff who deliver outstanding customer service.. This Hotel delivers well on everything.   We picked the Hotel for it’s pool and location if I am honest. We like to explore during the morning and evening when we travel. So having a pool to spend the afternoon around was essential. The pictures of the pool don’t do it justice. There is a adequately sized patio full of sun beds and a pagoda. The bar staff will take drink orders and bring them up to you as you sunbathe.  I don’t know where the hotel finds such excellent staff, but they all deliver outstanding customer service and are fun, smiley and always attentive.  We ate at the hotel three times and the food was always amazing.  The rooms are adequate…

title: Great location with very friendly efficient staff.....and a pool terrace!
review: 10 minute walk from the centre of town, this is an excellent base to explore beautiful Florence. Free wifi, large and comfy beds, breakfast on the rooftop overlooking the city. The rooftop pool is a great place to end the afternoon. Robert at breakfast was super friendly and welcoming. I will be back

title: Family stop in Florence during Italian tour
review: We stayed here for 3 nights. A couple plus 2 tall boys ( 11 and 15 ) and we LOVED the hotel .  Room was super modern and a had a good size , we had a double bed and 2 singles for the kids . Bathroom was very big with a great shower and a tub. We also had a balcony ( not sure if they all have it )  Location was great, we went everywhere in Florence by foot.  The highlight of the hotel is the rooftop, the pool was a great break for the boys and also for us to have a beer at the end of the day before going out for dinner . During the summer the pool at the top makes a big difference .  Breakfast was very good and had everything you need plus a great view ( it was also at the rooftop )  For us the only thing at the Kraft that was not great was the WiFi. It was very bad in the room…

title: Loved this hotel
review: This hotel gets 10/10.  The family room was spacious, spotless and the bathroom/shower was excellent with all toiletries lovely and a ton of towels supplied for the pool.  After a day exploring beautiful Florence it was a treat to go back to the hotel and go up for a swim and a few cocktails.  The hotel really is spotless and the staff couldn't be more helpful.  Roberto at breakfast gets a special mention for his great patter (a Scottish term).  The breakfast was excellent too :-) Will definitely return to this hotel.

title: Beautiful views of Firenze!
review: We spent four nights at the Kraft Hotel in July. The staff at the front desk could not have been any more helpful. They helped us locate the sights we wanted to see. Having come from 3 days in Rome we were pleasantly surprised how helpful the entire staff was. The view from the rooftop was amazing. Our room was very spacious with plenty of outlets. The location was an easy walk to the sights and the train station. If we get to return to Florence, we will definitely stay at Kraft Hotel.

title: Pleasant stay. Would return.
review: We stayed in the hotel for four days. We found it to be a good place to stay.  It was within walking distance of most places we wanted to visit. It had a view of the Arno river. It had a rooftop pool which was awesome since it was very hot when we were there. The breakfast was excellent. Roberto who runs the breakfast area in the AM is a very nice and funny guy.  Overall, I would recommend this hotel.

review: This is a great place to stay in Florence. From the minute we walked in the staff made us feel right at home. No request was to hard for these guys. Julia in the restaurant on the rooftop was amazing. She made our daughters feel like princesses which makes the experience extra special for them and us. I would recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Florence.

title: Great hotel with super friendly staff
review: So pleased we booked this hotel! The room was clean and well presented - a little sad we didn't have a balcony but no bother really. We stayed during the June heatwave and the aircon was a god send, as was the pool. It was lovely to get back after a hot walk and have a dip in the pool. The rooftop restaurant was fantastic - we really enjoyed the food and the waiting staff were lovely! The waitress (her name escapes me now I'm home) even remembered our room number and drinks orders by the end of the stay, great service! Have recommended family to come and stay as they are also planning a trip to Florence and we would definitely stay again!

title: Brief sojourn
review: We stopped here for one night at the end of our trip. The hotel is quite difficult to get to by car because the surrounding streets are very tight. There's no parking on-site but the staff will valet park at a nearby paid car park.  The hotel itself is quite old but well kept. There's a fantastic view of the city from the dining room on the roof and a good selection for breakfast.

title: Hotel in Florence
review: Delighted i chose this Hotel for my first experience of Florence. Great location close to the Arno river and all the popular sites but quite enough to allow you to savour this city at your own pace. Roof terrace is enchanting and the pool was a welcome respite in the hot weather. The staff(very friendly) were adept at meeting your needs and were respectful and discreet at all times. Understated excellence that allows you to make of Florence what you will.

title: Centrally Located Hotel
review: We stayed here for 4 nights in a Superior Double room and we thoroughly enjoyed the experience.  Check-in was quick, friendly and efficient, and we were allocated a corner room on the first floor which was excellent. The room was comfortably and stylishly furnished, and had a small balcony furnished with two chairs and a table. The bathroom although small was luxuriously finished in marble and had an excellent shower and good quality amenities. The room was also very quiet and we did not experience the noise that some other reviewers refer to.  What helps to make this hotel special is the rooftop terrace, bar and restaurant where the views over Florence are amazing. We had breakfast in the restaurant each day and the service and the choice of food was excellent. We also chose to…

title: Great place to stay.
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you very much for your feedback which is very important for us.  In the hope to welcome you again, we remain with our best regards  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: Great Choice
review: We stayed here for 4 nights last week, the location was very convenient, Roof views were beautiful. Room itself was on the 3rd floor, was very bright which my wife liked & the balcony was a bonus to sit & sip wine together! We did however hear noise within the hotel unlike the hotel in Rome, but no noise outside at night . The staff wasn't as friendly as our hotel in Rome but they certainly weren't unfriendly! The food in the restaurant was "ok" (compared to restaurants throughout Florence) at least they had one :) And when it got chilly, they brought out blankets for everybody which was very nice!

title: Our first visit & celebrating our 40th  Ruby Anniversary
review: Admittedly, May 2019 has not been the warmest month, but this response from the management, both in person and later in an email, is not sufficient apology in my view.  'Please consider that we are now having a very unusual weather situation.  We are in middle MAY ! We have never had  to keep the heating system on during this period   ! The temperatures have been very changeble from day to night . In addition we had set our system into the AC function about 1 month ago . Being a central system is not very easy to convert it into a heating system just for a few days ' . I was seriously cold in the hotel. So was my brother and everyone else I spoke to. I had to get two extra blankets so I could sleep. The first night - before I got the blankets - I had woolly tights on and a…

title: Excellent hotel
review: Dear Ms. Delvin,  We understand your position and we are not searching a excuse to hide the problem you had because of the cold season .  We were only pointing the fact that our air conditioning system cannot be converted at once from heating to AC and the other way around .  We apologize again and we remain with our best regards  Hotel Kraft

title: Not the gem of Florence
review: The hotel is a 10-15 minute walk from the City centre, hotel very Nice & clean with friendly staff. The hotel had a restaurant, we never used it. The hotel is situated in a quiet area, behind the American Embassy & near to the river Arno. When we checked in we were given a upgraded room which was very nice, & had a balcony as well. Not sure if our original room had a balcony, the wi-fi was very poor in the room, as mentioned by other people in the hotel. The breakfast room was situated at the top of the hotel, where you could sit outside & have a breakfast or have a smoke in the sunshine. This also leads up onto the pool are, where the small pool is situated.The swimming pool is very small I have to say, but nice when its a very warm day.Breakfast was very nice, & plenty to…

title: A bit fresh in Florence
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your feedback. It seems you liked the hotel apart something regarding the wi-fi and some amenities not totally satisfactory in the room .  We will work on it and we remain with our best regards  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: La Dolce Vita
review: The perfect quiet (but convenient) location to stay in Florence. Excellent staff, tasty breakfast with your choice of coffees, bar/dining deck with views, rooftop heated pool with views, clean rooms with high ceilings! Early check-in for us was very helpful...thanks to the awesome front desk lady. The only negative was that we could hear our neighbor in the next room snoring.  Little restaurant around the corner was good too.

title: Quite location. Convenient for the station.
review: Dear valued client,  We thank you very much for your feedback and we are happy you had a great time in Florence at Kraft Hotel.  We took note about the problem of the insonorisation from the neighbor in the next room,  With our best regards  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: Excellent Service and Great location
review: It seems appropriate that Hotel Kraft opened its doors the same year (1960) that the Frederico Fellini film, La Dolce Vita was released. You can indeed live the sweet life here. A Euro style boutique hotel with 78 rooms on six floors including a fabulous two level roof top terrace/bar/breakfast room & pool. Rooms are a decent size with all amenities, euro style high ceilings, impressive bathrooms (although sink faucet was difficult to operate) and impeccable beds & linens (maybe the best on our three week trip). Our third floor room was on the back of the hotel with a balcony facing the Arno river. Very pleasant and quiet. Front desk staff were swift to expedite any request but I have to say the star of the show and the emotional leader of the hotel is Roberto, the maitre d' and…

title: Lovely Hotel-highly recommend
review: Dear Sam & Kathy,  We thank you very much for your sweet words and we are at the same time proud  for having been able to give    our guests this kind of emotions.  We will extend  your compliments to Roberto and we really hope to welcome you back in the future .  We remain with our best regards  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: Great Experience and Amazing View
review: I love everything about this hotel. The sumptuous breakfast (included in room price, no exception) on the 5th floor with an amazing view of the cityscape, a few feet away from the river, 10 minutes walk to Santa Maria Novella train station and a short walking distance to the main attractions. The room decorated with great furnishing, comfortable bed, plenty of closet space, safe deposit box, FREE WIFI, coffee maker with complimentary tea and coffee. The bathroom equipped with great amenities (has a bidet), shower tub and high quality toiletries. The staff are convivial and obliging that makes the stay even more pleasant. There is no noise pollution in the area, which makes it great for good night sleep.

title: Bad receptionist manner
review: Dear guest,  We thank you very much for your feedback and we are happy you had a great time at the Kraft Hotel.  In the hope to welcome you again, we remain with our best regards  Luciano Becherucci Hoptel manager

title: Bad exp
review: The staff was friendly and the location was within walking distance to some of the major attractions. The rooms were clean and it had all the necessary amenities. The heated pool was a nice feature, however, it was March and windy so it was a brief swim, to say the least. The restaurant on the top level was awesome! The view over Florence was amazing and the food (including breakfast) was satisfying. The restaurant staff was friendly and the prices were reasonable. I certainly look forward to staying here again!

title: Great Service
review: It was just great to stay at hotel Kraft in Florence. The staff is very easy going, nothing is to much. The rooms are clean and spacious, breakfast is better than in most Italian hotels, the pool is really nice after a long day of sightseeing.  We were happy to park our rental car in the valet garage. Everything was great except for the garage employee who was really unfriendly when returning the car the last day and on top of his attitude trying to rip me of €20,-  Besides this weird guy, everything at the hotel was great!! I will be back here the next time.

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you very much for your feedback and we are glad you had a good experience at the Kraft Hotel.  In the hope to have you again as our guests, we remain with our best regards  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: 5 nights
review: We stayed 3 nights in room 128.  The room was beautiful and had a balcony.  The overall service in this hotel is outstanding.  From the front desk staff to the bar and breakfast room staff everyone is friendly and works very hard at making sure the guest has their needs taken care of during their stay.   The rooftop pool and view is great and relaxing with a beer in the evening looking out over Florence was enjoyable.  The location of the hotel is very good for the train station and also close to downtown and many great restaurants.  If I'm ever in Florence again I will stay at Hotel Kraft.

title: Struck lucky with this hotel jewel in the crown
review: Difficult to fault this place. Very clean and tidy. The reception staff were particularly helpful showing us all the best places to go. Breakfast was good with a good selection of food from hot buffet to continental. The room however small was well equipped and had every thing you needed including tea and coffee making facilities. There was also a fridge and a safe which is useful. In terms of its position it’s a 15 min walk from the station and a similar walk into the main part of the city. Would recommend..

review: Dear valued Guests,  We thank you very much for your feedback and we are extremely happy you had a good experience at the Kraft Hotel.  With our best regards  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: Location, Comfortable
review: Brilliant hotel.very central to everything but such a quiet area  The rooftop and restaurant area has the most amazing views couldn’t see anything else similar in the area  The staff were so friendly and helpful and gave the hotel a feeling of a family run establishment  Rooms were very clean spacious and well cared for  Would go back in a heartbeat

title: Great Rooftop Terrace with views
review: The hotel is clean, the location is perfect, personal is ok. A very nice little hotel, I can just recommend it.  The rooftop terrace is awesome with a wonderful view. The room is renovated, nice furnished, the elevator is a bit slow, but you can use the stairs either.

title: Great views, hard beds
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much indeed for your feedback. We are happy you had a good time at the Kraft Hotel.  Hope you will share your experience with other people and friends,  we hope to welcome you again in Florence .  Best regards  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: Fabulous Experince
review: The rooftop terrace is the best, and the reason we chose this hotel over others. We were visiting our daughter who is doing a semester abroad in Florence. The location is quite lovely as it is out of the busy-downtown area. The room itself was adequate but what sets it apart is the service. It is well worth getting the breakfast included in the booking as there is a variety of bakery goods, fruits, yogurts, as well as boiled and scrambled eggs, but the best part is the coffee to order. The breakfast hosts are charming.  The hotel itself is quite clean and functional. When we return to Florence, we are looking forward to staying again in this fine hotel.

title: Wonderful weekend
review: Kraft is a solid 4-star hotel, with all that you would expect - nice amenities and furnishings, clean, good breakfast, attractive lobby, friendly staff. Some extras are the rooftop pool and restaurant with lovely views, quiet neighborhood not far from the train station and Arno River, walking distance to the center of the city.  We were not notified about the ongoing construction noise in the hotel at all, but it only occurred during the day.  Our party had four different rooms. Three were quite nice and spacious, but one of was so small I could reach out and touch the wall while lying in bed. The furniture in that room, while very nice, made it seem more cluttered. The bathroom, however was fairly large. The staff was very accommodating about storing our luggage.

title: Best hotel in Florence
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you very much for your feedback and we are glad you had a good experience at the Kraft Hotel.  With our warmest regards  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: Fabulous
review: The position of the hotel was ideal, near to the main railway station, the historical city centre and not far from the river.  First impression on arrival, a friendly smiling welcome by the receptionist, quick and efficient check- in and a choice of stairs or lift to  the room.  The interior design of the room was mainly white which gave a light spacious effect (lovely high ceilings) and the very large window allowed in lots of natural illumination. The cleanliness of both room and bathroom were immaculate.  A real asset for this hotel is the top floor area with a 270° view overlooking the italian terracotta roof tops toward the centre of Florence with the rolling Tuscan hills in the background. Here was the bar, restaurant, large well furnished outside terrace and a heated…

title: Stunning High Quality Place with Caring Staff
review: Dear Guest,  It's a great pleasure  for us to hear you had a pleasant stay at Kraft Hotel.  We are pleased to reach guest's satisfaction and we really hope to welcome you again in Florence,  With our best and warmest regards  Luciano Becherucci  Hotel manager

title: The best place we stayed in the entire euro trip
review: Had a great stay in this lovely hotel, based on the banks of the river Arno. Around a very easy 10 minute walk to the duomo and to the historic centre . the rooms are a great size with a very modern, cool bathroom.

title: 4 day stay
review: Dear guest,  We thank you very much for your feedback and we are extremely happy you had a good time at the Kraft Hotel .  In the hope you will share your experience , we remain with our best regards .  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: Good staff but cold cheerless room
review: Hotel kraft is the best place we stayed in the entire eurotrip. The place was cozy. The people at reception were very warm. The breakfast was delicious and they accomodated us vegetarians by providing us few vegetables upon request. Special kudos to mr robetto in the buffet floor who took care of all the guests there and also OLA from the front desk.

review: Staff was extremely helpful. Great location, about 20 minutes walk from the Duomo and 10 minutes from the train station. Property was clean and well maintained. The outdoor pool is heated and has wonderful views of the skyline.

title: Excellent Hotel !
review: We loved this hotel in Florence, accommodating and helpful..the rooms where lovely and the food was great. Easy walk to town and in a lovely location. We travelled to 4 cities in a Italy and this hotel was our favorite.

Food was brill but what really topped it of was the view - eating amazing steak and drinking red wine as the sun goes dish was unforgettable. Highly recommend

title: Absolutely fantastic hotel
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you very much for your feedback and we are glad you a had a satisfactory and pleasant stay at Kraft Hotel.  It means we have reached our goal!  We remain with our warmest regards and we hope to welcome you again in the near future .  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: Super hotel, amazing views from the terrace
review: Me and my twin sister ate here twice as the food was delicious and the view from the top is outstanding. The wine list has all the best Italian grapes and stocks a nice Barolo. It’s not cheap but it worth a splash out when in Florence. The hotel is a little away from the centre, yet it is walking distance. The hotel staff are very friendly and helpful. I would go back.

title: Don't accept Room 154
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Superb & memorable stay at Kraft hotel
review: We stayed for 2 nights.  Room 154 at the Kraft Hotel had to be the worst room we stayed in during our 11 night tour.  It was on street level just inside a hallway from the lobby area and, unknown to us, over the "machine room", which had some deafening noises one afternoon.  Since it was at street level, we could not open the drape to get any natural light and the cars/motorbikes were disruptive during the night.  It appeared to be a handicap accessible room, but was so small that I don't think a wheelchair would have fit in the room anyway.  On the plus side, the rooftop terrace and breakfast were quite nice.   We did not request another room because we knew they must be full occupancy in order to give guests that room to start with.

title: 5 star accommodation!
review: Dear Guest,  We apologize for troubles you had in that room .  Actually during the period you stayed there, we had a problem to the burner of the thermal power plant which is located outdide the hotel just below the room 154 .  Unfortunately we could avoid this work otherwise we would have had troubles with the conditioning system.  On the other hand you could have asked our reception staff to have a room change and we would have done the best to meet with your request .  we understand when you say  "We did not request another room because we knew they must be full occupancy in order to give guests that room to start with."It's true , the hotel was full, but you couls have tried anyway .  Please accept our apologizes and we remain with our best regards

title: Highlight of Florence
review: THe hotel is ideally located 10 minutes walk to all the main sites. The rooftop terrace has to be the best view of Florence with great atmosphere. Rooms with balcony are perfect the hotel is on a quiet side street so no sleepless nights. the breakfast and evening meals are of a high standard and all the staff could not do enough for us. I would highly recommend anyone to stay here

title: Lovely Hotel, Conveniently Located

title: My happy place
review: Stayed here for a few days at the end of September as part of a longer trip to Italy and although overall the experience was OK there are definitely good and bad things about this hotel.  The location is great - took us less time to walk to the train station than it did to get a cab from there when we first arrived - and you can stroll along the river to the Cathedral and Ponte Vecchio areas in around 10-15 mins. The view from the rooftop bar back over the city is fantastic as well, unfortunately the weather was too windy while we were there for us to brave the pool but with better weather would imagine having that to use after a day’s walking round the city would be great.  Breakfast was fairly typical of our time in Italy with a good selection of hot and cold options plus a…

title: Great location, lovely staff
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you very much for your feedback and we are glad you had a good experience at the Kraft Hotel.  We apologize for the noisy occurred by the lifts . We will try toi solve this matter asap by checking this problem.  In the hope that you mostly appreciated our hotel, we remain with our best regards.  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: 1st rate hotel
review: I stayed here by myself end of August 2018. My room was ok, quite small with a slightly odd, extremely firm round bed! My only minor gripe was dirty marks on the wall which just needed a wipe (I did some of them myself).  However, it’s in a great and safe spot so I felt fine about walking back alone after dark.  The highlight is the terrace - I loved having my breakfast out there each morning (even with the wasps!). The pool/ sunbathing was fab too and the staff all very polite and friendly. When you’re alone, that counts for a lot. I would definitely go back.

title: Beautiful Location and very welcoming staff

title: Perfect city hotel
review: Fantastic hotel with friendly helpful staff. The rooftop bar has an amazing view over the City. The rooms were cleaned to a high standard each day and care was taken over our possessions. The location is just outside the main town with a short walk down the river Arno into town. I would recommend this hotel to anyone and would especially recommend a visit to the beautiful City of Florence.  Thanks for an amazing time.

title: Martina
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you very much for your feedback and we are glad you had a good experience at the Kraft Hotel.  Looking fgorward to welcoming you again we remain with our best regards  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: A magical place to visit
review: We stayed here for 4 nights on a city break. Perfect hotel. Located within easy walking distance of many of Florences’ best sites. Large room, ample storage, large, comfortable bed, good bathroom and shower. Very quiet room, we were on the 1st floor, minimal road noise. Excellent roof top terrace with gorgeous views, perfect for early or late evening cocktails!! And, of course, the added bonus of a rooftop pool!! All staff were engaging and helpful. Breakfast was of very good quality, excellent and varied choices. Hotel restaurant provided lunch and dinner also. We thought it was good value for the services offered and the location. We would thoroughly recommend this hotel.

title: Amazing location and service
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you very much for your feedback and we are proud for having left you a good " souvenir " of Florence .  We truly hope to welcome you again at the Kraft Hotel .  My personal warmest regards  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: Great hotel!
review: We arrived as a party of seven and the hotel and location did not disappoint. We were allocated three rooms; all varied in size and decor. Although all fairly newly, tastefully refurbished, one room was smaller than the others and had more limited storage and was lacking a safety deposit box. Breakfasts were delicious with a good variety on offer and the setting for the restraunt  was amazing. The rooftop pool was a fabulous addition and although busy, it was a welcomed haven at the end of a busy day of sightseeing. Staff were extremely welcoming and helpful. Good variety of restraunts  in the vicinity for evening meals. Close enough to main tourist attractions and transport networks, but far enough from the main hub to make it relaxing. Would not hesitate to rebook the hotel…

title: Perfect place
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you very much for your feedback and we are happy you had a satisfactory experience at the Kraft Hotel .  In the hope to welcome you agaian in our  remain with our warmest regards.  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: Perfection
review: First time visiting Florence and the hotel was amazing! Staff were very friendly and helpful. The roof top pool was amazing on a hot day for sunbathing and cooling down. The terrace was beautiful for breakfast and dinner with a wonderful view of the city. We dined at the hotel one night which was delicious, highly recommend the gnocchi. The hotel is well located and only takes around 10 minutes to walk to the centre either along the river or down the side streets. Highly recommended!

title: Pleasant hotel in Florence
review: We stayed for a week at the Kraft Hotel. Set back from the centre of Florence but within easy walking distance to a variety of small restaurants, shops and for a bit of culture - museums. Our room was adequate although could have done with more cupboard space as we lived out of our suitcase. The bed was quite hard and not very comfortable. However the spacious bathroom and the cleanliness of the room overall made up for this. The pool area on the rooftop was very relaxing. The restaurant served a fresh breakfast every morning and in the evening served a beautiful supper. Service for tea/coffee was very slow and most mornings our breakfast was finished before being offered tea/coffee. The view from the rooftop restaurant was stunning and very relaxing. Overall a very nice hotel.

title: Absolutely amazing
review: Dear Client,  We thank you very much for your feedback and we take note about your comment regarding the breakfast service  .  With our best regards

title: Family vacation
review: The Kraft Hotel is conveniently located near the Sta María Novella train station on a quiet street. They have a beautiful rooftop restaurant, and a great breakfast buffet. The air conditioning works well, which is important for Americans. I would have rated the hotel higher, but our bed was so hard that it left us sore in the morning.

title: A few days in Florence
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you very much for your feedback and we are really happy you appreciated the hotel amenities and services.  In the hope to welcome you again, we remani twith our warmest regards  Luciano Becherucci Hotel manager

title: A perfect rooftop evening
review: Friendly and helpful staff in the restaurant and reception. The manager at breakfast was very nice with both guests and his staff.    Lovely breakfast with fresh Italian coffee made to order.  This was served on the rooftop terrace with beautiful views over the city. The pool on the top was great to relax by at the end of the day.   Good location close to the station, a pleasant walk along the river to the main attractions.   Our room for 3 was spacious with good beds (quite firm), soft light quilts, efficient air conditioning and a a kettle.  Storage space limited given that we were there for a week.  It was very clean and the bedding was changed every two days.   We would definitely stay here again.

We really enjoy the terrace for the wonderful breakfast that was included. The rooms are bright and very clean. Everyone is really helpful and friendly, especially for me, whom speaks mainly English. We definitely would come back to this hotel and we definitely would recommend it to anyone! Grazie mille per tutto

title: Simply Wonderful 😊
review: Dear guest,  We thank you very much for your feedback and we are glad you had a good experience in our Hotel.  Best regards

title: Fabulous Hotel
review: After a day sightseeing,there is nothing better than relaxing by the pool on the roof or sipping a cocktail in the bar in the roof terrace bar with their fabulous views of the city. I was impressed from the moment we arrived at the hotel. We arrived early and told our room was ready. We were also given a lot of useful information to help us make the best of our stay. Our room was comfortable and tastefully decorated. The quality of cleaning was excellent. Breakfast was on the roof-though self-service, the staff were very helpful and attentive. They seemed to genuinely want to ensure that hotel guests had the best possible stay. The hotel is in a quiet location, about 5 minute walk from the railway station-ideal if you’ve come fromPisa airport as we had. The main attractions are…

title: In 40 degree heat you need this Hotel.
review: Stayed at the Kraft hotel for nine nights; the room was excellent, clean and well presented with quiet yet efficient air conditioning and other features which were nice to have (such as USB charging points and electrically operated window blinds). The rooms were cleaned daily and the sheets and towels changed frequently. The Wi-Fi is free, I found connection a bit erratic at times but generally quite acceptable. Food is served on the panoramic roof terrace which is well maintained provides a great view of Florence while you eat. The food itself is of a good quality and standard, there is a large choice of breakfast while coffee is freshly prepared to order and brought to your table, which is a great touch. I did order from the evening menu, it is a little expensive, as with all…

title: Simply amazing.
review: Dear valued guest ,  We tahnk you very much for your kind feedback and we are happy that you had a good time in our Hotel .  At your disposal for any further suggestion you may have we remain with our best regards  The Hotel management

title: Great little hotel with wonderful staff
review: Quietly located away from the centre (10minute walk) , this Hotel has a fantastic roof top bar and restaurant with excellent views across the city.  Breakfast can be taken here, and the restaurant Manager is great fun. The Austrian interns, speak fantastic English, and are really hardworking. And when you return from the days sight seeing, there is nothing better than to take the lift to floor P which is the roof top Swimming Pool and sun lounge area.  All really polite and pleasant with no fighting for sunbeds in this Hotel.  Heaven in a lovely city.

title: EXCELLENT!
review: Dear Guest ,  We thank you very much for your feedback .  We are glad you had a good stay at Kraft Hotel and we hope to welcome you again .  Our best regards  Hotel Kraft

title: Truly special experience
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. Commuters and tourists come across the constant hustle and bustle of the station before exiting, taking a few steps and stopping amazed in Piazza di Santa Maria Novella. It is impossible not to admire the the square, housing one of the most charming basilicas in Florence. The area has plenty of local spots to taste Tuscan specialties, but don’t stop in the main streets alone; the narrower side streets always ensure satisfaction. The huge Parco Delle Cascine provides a solution to the need for a green area as well as a historic welcome in the form of a bronze statue of King Vittorio Emanuele II riding a horse.

title: Cannot wait to go back
review: We stayed at Hotel Kraft in July and wished we could have stayed longer. The family room was huge - very spacious for a family of four - and spotlessly clean.The location was perfect - quieter as slightly out of the hustle and bustle but a short walk along the river to the Ponte Vecchio. The highlight is the rooftop deck and pool. What incredible views! Breakfast out on the terrace was also sensational. Florence is a stunning city and this hotel was perfect. Would absolutely stay again.

title: Best view in the city!
review: Dear Guest ,  We thank you very much for your feedback .  We are glad you had a good stay at Kraft Hotel and we hope to welcome you again .  Our best regards  Hotel Kraft

title: An efficent hotel in a good location
review: Fabulous hotel one minute walk from the Arno river and 15mins to the centre of Florence. Clean,comfortable rooms we had a Superior room with small balcony. Bathroom excellent with good shower and toiletries. The roof terrace was fantastic with splendid views over Florence. Breakfast delicious and evening dinner couldn’t fault. Restaurant manager so friendly and helpful and all the staff were always smiling and seemed happy to be working there. Loved the small pool to cool down in after a few hours walking round Florence

title: Great for a summer visit to Florence
review: Dear Guest ,  We thank you very much for your feedback .  We are glad you had a good stay at Kraft Hotel and we hope to welcome you again .  Our best regards  Hotel Kraft

review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Very nice hotel close to Arno, quite location.
review: Hotel is nice and clean.  Rooms are a little outdated and the bed is hard.  The rooftop is beautiful, nice to sit and have drinks at night.  Food is good but service can be very slow.  Paulo was excellent at the rooftop bar.

title: The perfect location
review: We had a very pleasant stay at Kraft Hotel. Nice quite location near Arno. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Clean rooms, and the roof terrace and pool was extremely nice to use in the hot weather.

title: A gem of a hotel
review: Dear Guest ,  We thank you very much for your feedback .  We are glad you had a good stay at Kraft Hotel and we hope to welcome you again .  Our best regards  Hotel Kraft

title: 4 days in paradise
review: This is a quiet, friendly and clean hotel with exceptional facilities in a quiet residential location, but also within easy walking distance of the main city (15 mins).   The view from the terrace is breathtaking (this is where breakfast is served together with other meals).  There is also a small pool and lounge area also with amazing views. Breakfast was excellent, with a wide choice.  Given the the spectacular views we decided to eat here on our last evening.  The food was very good and reasonable priced. We had a room for four which was spacious and well equipped bathroom.

title: Nice stay
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. Commuters and tourists come across the constant hustle and bustle of the station before exiting, taking a few steps and stopping amazed in Piazza di Santa Maria Novella. title: Elegance after renovation!
review: We stayed here for two nights. We had booked standard double room. Our room was allotted next to the elevator which was not so pleasant. We asked for paid up-gradation but the front desk bluntly refused which was disappointing. The location of the hotel is ok as the city center or the main attractions are 10-15 mins walk so is the station. We usually prefer hotels in the central location. The terrace of this hotel offered really nice view of the city. Breakfast was served there. All the staff at the terrace were helpful with smiles on their face throughout, which is very welcoming. The receptionist in the evening time was also helpful. Overall a nice stay, would have been better if we our rooms would be upgraded.

title: Great service . Great location
review: Dear Guest ,  We thank you very much for your feedback .  We are glad you had a good stay at Kraft Hotel and we hope to welcome you again .  Our best regards  Hotel Kraft

title: Nice hotel slightly too far outside the city centre
review: First impressions are a bit sketchy as this hotel is undergoing some fairly major renovation, which is the first thing that hits you when you turn up at reception....disarray and noise! However our room was very elegant, with wonderful high ceilings, antique style furniture and a beautifully tiled bathroom, which though quite small was still very functional. The front facing staff unfortunately were a bit shabby, not matching up to the elegance being developed around the hotel.....looking unshaven, grey shirts and creased suits....although generally very friendly and helpful. However a very curt response was given when requesting an adaptor to try to use the plug in the room to charge a phone, as unfortunately modern usb points were not installed, which was a surprise given the…

title: Lovely Rooftop
review: Dear Guest ,  We thank you very much for your feedback .  We are glad you had a good stay at Kraft Hotel and we hope to welcome you again .  Our best regards  Hotel Kraft

title: Wonderful stay with my mobility impaired husband
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Spectacular roof top vistas and great quiet location
review: We from 8 May to 13 May. We were given a wonderful, spacious room with a balcony.  All the staff we dealt with at reception and restaurant were very friendly and forthcoming. The room was spacious, charmingly decorated, well equipped and always immaculately clean. Any help or information we needed was immediately attended to with a smile and a friendly word. The location is great for all purposes and a short taxi drive away from anything you wish to see (my husband used a manual wheelchair to get about). We highly recommend this hotel and would definitely stay there again.

title: Great Place
review: This hotel was a very nice surprise. Quiet location 10 min walk from train station and a block and a half from the Arno River.  What you need to see is the amazing roof top restaurant and pool area. Gorgeous views of Florence. Breakfast on the roof was such a relaxing experience every morning. The lobby is beautiful, great music atmosphere. The room had very comfortable beds and beautiful bathrooms.

title: Outdated hotel with great breakfast and rooftop
review: My wife and I were only able to stay for one night and had to be at the airport at 4 am the next morning. Needless to say, the staff took care of everything and had breakfast packed to go for us the next morning. The room was spectacular and the rooftop dinner with the Duomo and Uffizi in the background was something I’ll always remember.

title: Couple days in Florence
review: This hotel was ok, but in need of some updating of the very old decor of the rooms and the bed was so hard I had a difficult time sleeping because I just couldn’t get comfortable. I noticed hard beds were pretty typical in Italy but this was the worst. The location of the hotel is pretty close to everything, but still required about a 20 minute walk to get near the duomo so it was a little further out of the way than I had hoped with not much to do immediately surrounding the hotel.   The highlight is definitely the rooftop and the hotel had the best breakfast we had at any hotel in Italy.

title: Great Location, excellent hotel, just like Florence !
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. Commuters and tourists come across the constant hustle and bustle of the station before exiting, taking a few steps and stopping amazed in Piazza di Santa Maria Novella. title: A Wonderful Hotel. A Great Location
review: Stayed for 3 nights at this hotel whilst visiting Florence. The room was spacious and clean, the staff were welcoming, courteous and friendly. The rooftop terrace for breakfast and evening meal was superb, the view is pretty good too. If you want a swim then try the rooftop pool as well. Can't fault this hotel and its location, will stay again when we next visit Florence, as go back we must.

title: Great Hotel read review to make the most of your holiday.
review: We've just returned from a few days city break in Florence with some friends, and stayed at the Kraft Hotel. What an absolute gem this place turned out to be.  My wife found the hotel through some diligent investigation as this was our first visit to the city and although we wanted somewhere within easy walk to the main center, we also wanted some space to relax and unwind after long days of exploration.  The hotel is less than ten minutes walk from the train station, as we arrived via Pisa. It's also a few yards from the river bank and as we also found out, the American Consulate. It's a very quiet little neighbourhood but you can walk straight to bars and restaurants which are literally round the corner.   The hotel stands in a block on its own so all rooms have windows with…

title: great location
review: Hotel Kraft, Great little Gem. Just behind the American consulate it's quite but moments away from all the action. The roof top pool is heated and the roof deck and bar is a great way to finish off a night as your just above everything so the views are great . €6 for a large beer meant it was cheaper than most bars. Breakfast was good but the service was a little slow but their enthusiasm make up for it. If your going for a cheap room then ask for room 132 or 128 as they are the biggest , room 130 has a balcony. If you can upgrade cheaply then the rooms are lovely but our room 132 was fantastic 12ft high ceilings walk in marble shower big enough for 2. Iron avalible which is always useful and 10 mins walk from the train station. Hope you enjoy it as much as we did.

title: Vacation in Florence
review: Our trip to Florence and staying at the Kraft Hotel was great. Located 15 to 20 mins walk along the river to the Ponte Vecchio meant we were in a quite location. Checking in we were given a map of our location with some great advice on places to visit including restaurants and must see places etc. The hotel staff are very friendly and helpful , its restaurant on the top give great views along with a great breakfast, evening meal and a well stocked bar. Our room on the first floor was spacious, clean and well laid out. Nice bathroom with a selection of toiletries, lovely towels all contributed to a comfortable stay, along with air conditioning. We did feel the bed mattresses were a bit on the firm side though, not giving a  good nights sleep. Our return trip to Florence will be…

title: Exploring Italy
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Amazing!
review: The staff was helpful and polite.  The rooms were clean.  The beds were comfortable.  The restaurant had some good options for gluten free eating.  Part of the restaurant was open on the roof and had lots of windows inside to look out over he beautiful scenery.  We ate supper one night under the stars and moon.  Memorable moments.

title: Amazing roof top pool and restaurant
review: This place is amazing, the rooms are lovely and comfortable, the bathrooms are clean and spacious, all of the staff were amazing, and the breakfasts are the best I've ever eaten!  We will definitely use this hotel again!

title: Florence 2018
review: Well located 10 minute walk from train station which we walked to and from daily. 15 minute walk to main tourist attractions.  Room was clean. Found bathroom and shower to be a little small. This hotel offered air conditioning which others don't in the month of April.   Any short fallings of the room  (bathroom) are certainly forgiven come breakfast which is served overlooking the beautiful Florence skyline. We also used the heated pool which was the only hotel to offer this on our travels so far out of 6 hotels.

title: Very good hotel!
review: This hotel is small, but very accommodating.  The breakfast is in the rooftop near the pool, is included, and very good.  The bathroom is large, the room itself is small but comfortable. Front desk is very accommodating.

title: Old Hotel in Need of Updates
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Excellent!
review: My husband and I stayed for 3 nights in early April. The hotel is a quick walk from the train/bus station and seemed like a decent neighborhood.  Room Details - We had a room on the 2nd floor with a balcony that overlooked the grassy area on the street. Nice to relax on in the morning/night. The room itself was pretty bad honestly, in desperate need of updates. The decor was old and outdated, the furniture was very worn. The bed was HARD AS A ROCK, and pillows were awful. The first day we showered we noticed a ton of water leaking from multiple areas. We ended up just wiping it up with our towels, but we should never need to do that. The mini fridge wasn't cold at all and had a note that if you wanted to use it for your personal items you needed to ask "permission".   The…

title: Nice Peaceful hotel,
review: The hotel is located close to the train station (very convenient if you plan to travel) but in a very pleasant, quiet neighborhood.  The staff of the hotel is utmost polite and helpful. The room (#401) was not big but very cosy and clean with a large balcony with 2 chairs and a table.  The bathroom is brand new with a window. The breakfast is just excellent with a large choice of dishes and a tremendous view over Florence.  There is a heated swimming pool on the roof.  The hotel is just excellent.

title: A lovely hotel with great view
review: I stayed with my family at the Kraft Hotel for 4 Nighta in April 2018. The Rooms were  a bit Small for the 4 of us, but we manage. The worst thing were the pillows of the bed, they were hard as a table.  The best thing was the breakfast, really good, very friendly staff always helping us when we needed something. The roof pool is heated and very  nice for kids. The hotel is situated in a very calm and peaceful area... and you have a taxi station at 2 blocks. Nice hotel. Small rooms. Great breakfast. Very nice staff. The only bad thing .. the pillows.

title: Beautiful hotel with amazing rooftop terrace!
review: This is a lovely hotel close to Train station. From the first look you can spot luxury. The rooms were nice with high ceiling and comfortable beds.  Terrace restaurant was fantastic. The view from there is amazing. The swimming pool was heated, kids had fun dipping in the pool.   They even gave shawl to keep warm if you like to sit outside and enjoy the view.  The only complain I have is there was no mirror in the room but 2 in bathroom. It was difficult to get ready when someone is in bathroom. We were in room 144.    Also the breakfast was good for non vegetarian people but not for vegetarians. There is no hot food for vegetarians or vegans. So we had to eat bread butter and cake!  Overall a good experience. If you like Indian food then do visit Gandhi restaurant very close to…

title: Fantastico!
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Great breakfast with a view
review: Room was nice, great location close to the Arno, about a 15' minute walk to the center, amazing rooftop views, heated rooftop pool, excellent breakfast, very friendly, fun staff. Very highly recommend!

title: Great value for money
review: Stayed in Kraft hotel for 3 nights, our room on the 1st floor.   1st of all amazing breakfast with a spectacular view, breakfast staff are very friendly and accommodating.  The hotel is beautiful, cleaned and has a heated pool on the top floor.  I only gave it a 4 star due to one incidence, my wife complained about a foul smell coming in our window.  My wife reported it  to the front desk and the lady at the front desk said it was normal usually after it rain in Florence.  She said Florence usually stinks after it rain and for us we don't think that's the answer you give to your guests.   Overall our room is clean, the cleaning lady did an excellent job and she was very friendly.   Check In (Daniel) and check out was very smooth and quick.

title: Enjoyable stay very welcoming
review: We stayed for 2 nights at this hotel. Everything was great.  It's about a 10 minute walk from the train station and 20 minute walk into the centre of Florence along the river.   The room was clean and the bed comfortable. Our room was on the ground floor and could probably do with a lick of paint but apart from that it was great.   My plug adapters wouldn't fit into the sockets, nor would the kettle in the room. The front desk provided adapters for free and the service all around was great, friendly and welcoming.  There is a restaurant/bar with a terrace on the top floor which does great cocktails at night with great service and a lovely view over Florence.   Breakfast is also in the restaurant on the top floor and had a good variety of food with coffee served at the table.  …

title: Brilliant hotel!
review: I really liked this hotel. It is situated in a quiet location but still within walking distance to everything. Our room over looked the road with a small balcony. The room was very clean and comfortable with a lovely bathroom with thick fluffy towels and lemon scented shower gel. A safe, mini bar and an extra blanket was as available.   The restaurant is situated on the fifth floor which gives a stunning view of the rooftop city. The breakfast was lovely. I especially liked the bacon and scrambled egg. There was a good choice of cold meats, cheese, yoghurt, cake and fruit.

title: Nice hotel!
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Beautiful, but disappointing
review: This is a nice hotel, nearby to Santa Maria Novella train station, has a nice restaurant at the roof with a good selection of local and internacional dishes, there is a pool on the top that hotel claims to be temperature controlled but we didn’t check it, at 2 celcius average outside temperature we wouldn’t use it anyway. Breakfast was great, many selection but they need more chafers to keep fried eggs warm, the guy in charge told us that new chafers will come soon, but anyway restaurant is a plus on this hotel, my only complain is that they are making big refurbishment, very nice finishing but the method used is a light construction so you can easily hear even the shower drops from the top room, we were located at first floor don’t know if this condition repeats on other floors.

title: Very nice
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you very much for your feedback and we hope to welcome you again in Florence .  Best regards  The manager

title: Honeymoon stay
review: I will start with the positives: the view from the restaurant and roof top is spectacular. The hotel is a short walk from the city centre, about ten minutes. There was a fair selection in the continental breakfast. The staff are all friendly and polite.   The rooftop pool was not heated as advertised on the website, this was a major disappointment as of course it is ice cold in the winter otherwise.   Although there is a kettle in the room only two tea bags were provided, I had to ask everyday for more and it is was very poor quality anyway. There was no coffee or hot chocolate available in the room, you can a pay a few euros at the bar but this should be included in the room for a four star hotel.   There were renovation works were taking place on the floor below from about 8 -…

title: Great hotel quiet location
review: This was the first hotel on our trip. Without any expectations, what a great place to start!  The room was perfect size for 2 people. It was clean and had a view of the street but that was ok because the view from the roof was breathtaking. If you get up there early enough, you can watch the sunrise. well, that was in November .  I thought the location was decent but we were on a tour bus. It wasn't far to see David. The shower was a little small for me but it's only a shower. The breakfast buffet was really good as was the restaurant . All the staff was really friendly.

title: Wonderful place to stay!
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Beautiful views
review: Loved everything about this hotel. Front desk staff was very friendly and helpful the breakfast was very good and also the hotel room was very clean. I hope to make a return to visit this lovely hotel.

title: Just say “No!”
review: We stayed at the Kraft for three nights during a very hot July in Florence. Receptionist are not overly friendly but provided information we needed. Our family of four had a corner room with a king bed, pull out couch and roll away bed. Very tight space but comfortable and adequate considering we were just there to sleep. The pool was quite inviting after long hot walks around the city. It’s a bit of a walk to the center of town but not too bad during the nice evenings. Walls were thin, people in the adjoining room complained we were loud with just normal volume conversation (our children are teenagers, luckily we didn’t have crying little ones!)   Breakfast was a our delight, served in the rooftop and a beautiful buffet of fruits, eggs, and pastries. But best of all were the…

title: Better go to other hotel
review: The front lobby is very nice, clean and inviting but that is where the good ends. There was a stench coming from the alley trash area outside our room on the first floor. The shower area flooded daily making the bathroom dangerously slippery with a marble floor. Here is the worst part...the breakfast buffet experience. The breakfast buffet ends at 10:30am...we arrived at the entrance knowing they would be closing soon so we were fine with a few pieces of fruit or something small and quick. The gentleman who welcomed us was very nice and I did ask him if we were too late to eat? He said, “It is a buffet and you are welcome to come in.” After we were seated, the manager of the coffee came over and made an announcement at our table that publicly humiliated and shamed us. He loudly…

title: Very impressed
review: Picture yourself in a Four Stars Hotel at Florence rates where during the whole working day there is a hammer on your Head because of work in The close rooms. The recepcionist consider that it us absolutely normal. Better go to another hotel

title: Mixed Reception 3.5 out of 5
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Wonderful place to stay
review: So, a few days have passed since I stayed in this hotel and I have some mixed views.  When I look back, it leaves me with mixed feelings!..  The location of the hotel is OK, there is a 15 minute or so walk from here to the shopping district (which has some of the churches and fantastic spots to eat) and is safe due to the Embassy that is nearby.  The hotel from the external may not look special, however when you first enter (the automatic) doors it is uplifting, I was on the first floor, 5th floor was breakfast which is included and 6th is the pool.  The room was disappointing, in my opinion no where near 4 star standard, however the fact I had the only balcony on my side raised it ever so slightly. The bed was not comfortable and had two small pillows with no backboard, the…

title: Enjoyable
review: Very well appointed hotel with friendly, helpful staff Excellent breakfast can be taken on the terrace overlooking the Duomo and listening to the bells.  I hope to make a return visit to this lovely hotel

title: Classy Florentine Retreat
review: Friendly helpful staff we only had breakfast which was excellent. Our only complaint was the bedroom it was small and need refurbished. There is a pool at this hotel which we didn't use as it was cold and is supposed to be heated

title: Dirty
review: Loved everything about this hotel.  The front desk staff were polished and helpful. While checking in, my bags were delivered promptly to the room.  I enjoyed a delicious pasta lunch in the rooftop terrace dining room. The next morning, an elegant and generous buffet was provided.  The spacious room was quiet, with lighting well thought out.  I hope to return to any Kraft Hotel property after this experience.

title: Tucked away gem.

title: Nice Experience....
review: Loved the rooftop pool, the fantastic views from the terrace restaurant for breakfast and dinner, and the amazing service throughout. A tucked away gem with stylish, modern rooms (some with balconies).

title: Primo place to stay
review: Dear Guest,  We really thank you for the lovely feedback you wrote after your stay .  We remain with our warmest regards  The hotel manager

title: Fantastic Rooftop Views!
review: Lovely hotel in a quite area. Within walking distance there are plenty of bars and restaurants and the major sights are within a 15-20 minute walk.The hotel restaurant is good too with a lovely rooftop terrace and views. The rooms are on the smallish side but very clean and lovey bathroom. We were most impressed though by the politeness and helpfulness of the staff. ( especially the waiting/bar staff ), we stayed for three nights and thoroughly enjoyed it.

title: Really great find!
review: Dear Guest,  We really thank you for the lovely feedback you wrote after your stay .  We remain with our warmest regards  The hotel manager

title: Location, the view and staff
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. Commuters and tourists come across the constant hustle and bustle of the station before exiting, taking a few steps and stopping amazed in Piazza di Santa Maria Novella. The huge Parco Delle Cascine provides a solution to the need for a green area as well as a historic welcome in the form of a bronze statue of King Vittorio Emanuele II riding a horse.

title: Comfortable living
review: We spent three wonderful weeks at the hotel Kraft and enjoyed every second. We had planned to stay for 4 days bt sometimes life surprises and we were had to prolong our stay something that hotel Kraft were very accommodating with. We could not have chosen a better hotel. The location is 15 minutes from the city, it’s a calm and quiet neighborhood with trees outside. The restaurant and dinners are magnificent and the view is spectacular. To start the day with breakfast on the roof is a treat, and having capuchino brought out to the table by Roberto or Daria is always genuine. This Morning breakfast ceremony will be deeply missed as we return to Sweden this afternoon. The room we stayed in 228 was great and we slept like kings  - I think I will request the same Room when we return…

title: Enjoyable stay in Florence
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you very much for your kind feedback after your stay at the Kraft Hotel.  In the hope to welcome you again in Florence, we remain with our best regards  The Hotel Manager

title: Stunning Roof Top Bar
review: We stayed for 6 nights during our Italy visit. The room given to us was nice with comfortable beds . The bathroom was spacious and modern with good toiletries and our white towels. The breakfast was good for a non vegetarian person but since we are vegetarians we had very little to choose from. When we informed the manager of the breakfast venue he quickly arranged salad for us which was served to us as long as we were there. The manager, I will call him Robert because I have forgotten his Italian name which sounded much like this, is an amazing person! He took care of each guests need individually. He never forgot to greet every guest when they entered the room and wished them good day when they left! Fantastico isn't it!!

title: Rooftop Dining was an extra bonus.
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you very much for your kind feedback after your stay at the Kraft Hotel.  Should you have any suggestion to improve even more our standards they will be welcome.  The Hotel Manager

title: Great City Hotel for exploring Florence.
review: The staff at this hotel are probably the most friendly and helpful that I have ever encountered. The hotel is well situated in a quiet area just 10 mins walk from the busy and noisy centre. Great facilities and roof top swimming pool / terrace is a great relaxation area. Meals on the terrace overlooking Florence is just breath taking. Would recommend room with a balcony for that extra special space.

title: Perfect hotel !
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you very much for your feedback and we are happy you enjoyed your stay at the Hotel Kraft.  Looking forward to welcoming you agagin in Florence, we remain with our warmest regards  The Hotel Manager

title: Lovely location
review: We stayed 4 nights as a base to explore Florence. The room was very clean and well presented. The reception staff were friendly and helpful. The star of the Hotel though,  was the rooftop Bar, Restaurant and pool. It was a wonderful experience to enjoy buffet breakfast overlooking the city. The Bar and Restaurant staff were extremely friendly and could not do enough for you. Rooftop dining was also a real treat, the range of the menu and the quality was also excellent.

title: Beautiful hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Than you very much for your feedback .   The guest satisfaction is a primary target for us and we are happy when we reach this goal.  With our warmest regards  The Hotel Management

title: Tired hotel
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Perfect location for Florence
review: This hotel has an amazing terrace on the fifth floor and a warm pool. It is the only reason i scored it as high as I did. Great views. However, there are plenty of better hotels out there surely! Rooms are tired and in need of a coating of paint. The bath was chipped in many places and yes of course I found a long black hair in the bath on arrival. The room comes with a small kettle and tea and coffee but no teaspoon- so you have to use the pencil provided! The internet varies from one to three bars and is either slow or unresponsive so forget face time. We were told we had a nice quiet room on check in but 301 is next to the maids storage cupboard where they make so much noise very early morning. The street is also fairly noisy I had to buy ear plugs to sleep, luckily a…

title: Lovely little jewel
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you very much for your feedback .  We will take in high consideration the remarks about the room you had  and we will work to solve this matter .  Looking forward to welcoming you agagin in Florence, we remain with our warmest regards  The Hotel Manager

title: Excellent Hotel
review: We stayed at this hotel for 2 weeks as our base for Florence and the surrounding area. It's in a quite part of town, approximately 20-30 minutes walk from the main attractions. That offered enough time to walk off all the excess food. The hotel is 1 block from the Ricer Arno. The roof top terrace restaurant, bar and pool offer great views over Florence. It is rated as a 4-star hotel which is generous but rewards the effort that the owners and staff put it to make the hotel clean, tidy and efficient. The pool was too cold to swim in whilst we stayed and there aren't many sun beds (about 8 I recall). The lunchtime menu is quite limited but the views are impressive. The room and ensuite was spacious and well equipped. We booked a room with a balcony which overlooked the road…

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Sorry for delay in anwering to your feedback. We thank you very much and we will put our attention to your remarks.  In the hope to welcome you again we remain with our best regards  The Hotel Manager

title: First Class
review: Stayed here as part of a package. We arrived by train so its location, just 8 minutes walk from the station was ideal. Reception staff were efficient, friendly and helpful. The room was perfect for us and we loved the roof terrace, particularly for breakfast. Central Florence was easy to reach on foot. We have no hesitation in recommending this hotel.

title: Perfect Retreat Central to Florence
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you very much for your review and we are really happy for having provided you with a nice stay . In the hope to welcoming you again at the KRAFT we remain with our best regards  The Hotel Management

title: Gorgeous hotel with view and pool
review: This Hotel is in a great location, away from the hustle and bustle of the town but not too far away to walk to all the attractions. The staff speak wonderful English and are extremely helpful, always ready to help but not intrusive. If you leave your bags standing, when you arrive, a porter arrives and grabs hold of them so you have no choice but to tip him. Having said that, he was old and happy with whatever, so I was ok with that. This hotel is clean and upkeep is excellent. Can I say at this point that getting to Florence from Pisa airport is simple, only two connections that come and go regularly and are about 15 euros per person.  I noticed that transport to and from hotel taken with our agents, Love Holidays, would have cost £300! Another black point for Love Holidays is…

title: Lovely hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your feedback.  In the hope to welcome you back in Florence we remain with our best regards  The Hotel mamangement

title: Brilliant hotel
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. Commuters and tourists come across the constant hustle and bustle of the station before exiting, taking a few steps and stopping amazed in Piazza di Santa Maria Novella. title: Romance in Florence
review: Loved this hotel, staff very friendly and helpful, great choice for breakfast , beds extremely comfy, large room and very cool and airy due to high ceilings & what better than relaxing on the rooftop pool in the afternoon after walking around beautiful Florence , 5 minute walk to the train station & 10 minute walk into the centre with all the attractions shops & Gelato 🍧  Would defiantly stay at Kraft again on next visit to Florence... loved it 💕

title: Excellent Hotel!
review: Hotel is very good and quiet, located, close to river and  in safty part of town,10-15 min walking to the center, you really don't need a car.  Staff are very nice, allways with  smile. They park your car somewhere in the garage, and drive it back in a few minutes when you ask for it. It's good, because their garages are small, and if you are not a good driver, you have a problem. Room was big and with balcony, as we got a free upgrade and a bottle of water from minibar.  Bed was very comfortable. AC was good, but working almost all the time. When you came back to room, outside was 37C, you entered in a fridge. Breakfast was average, small choice of salami. Hotel needs to be refurbished. The paint from th wooden balcony door and room door was peeling. The balcony floor was…

title: Super Hotel!
review: If you want a hotel that ticks all of the boxes, then this is the one!  The location is excellent and it is waking distance to all places you will likely want to visit. The staff are extremely warm and friendly. The rooms are well appointed, clean and are a good size. The breakfast was fresh.  The roof top terrace and pool are excellent and something you would not expect on a city break to Florence. The views are stunning.  I would 100% recommend and will return.

title: Excellent value for money.
review: Amazing property in the heart of the city! Friendly team! Super amazing Terrace! Perfect or actually ideal value for money! Rooms are very clean! Food is good enough! I would say 4* plus,not just a 4* property. Special thanks to Alessandra Tofani for the professional friendly attitude!

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. Commuters and tourists come across the constant hustle and bustle of the station before exiting, taking a few steps and stopping amazed in Piazza di Santa Maria Novella.
